title: 07/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to a report that the Mavericks and Heat are making a strong push for Kawhi Leonard in free agency and which team will be the best fit. He predicts a major trade in the NBA involving 2 superstars and championship contending teams. He also plays a new game called "Paul or Pass". Plus, Suns F Cam Johnson joins the show to talk about their run to the NBA Finals and how Chris Paul changed the culture of the organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
